index.js - Fis3 Code

Global variables defined

  • ikey
  • index

Functions defined

  • assign
  • find

Source code

  1. 'use strict';
  2. ‌var no;
  3. ‌var ikey = 'data-rome-id';
  4. ‌var index = [];

  6. ‌function find (thing) { // can be a DOM element or a number
  7.   if (typeof thing !== 'number' && thing && thing.getAttribute) {
  8.     return find(thing.getAttribute(ikey));
  9.   }
  10.   var existing = index[thing];
  11.   if (existing !== no) {
  12.     return existing;
  13.   }
  14.   return null;
  15. }

  17. ‌function assign (elem, instance) {
  18.   elem.setAttribute(ikey, instance.id = index.push(instance) - 1);
  19. }

  21. module.exports = {
  22.   find: find,
  23.   assign: assign
  24. };
